summary: HeroSection now references a new professional background image and adds multi-layer gradient/tint overlays intended to improve legibility and align with the light-blue theme, while keeping CTA scroll behavior intact. However, the required new static image asset itself is not shown as added in the diff, and a modified summary file claims multiple unrelated site-wide changes that are not evidenced by the provided code changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new generated background image under frontend/public/assets/generated (ca-hero-bg-professional.dim_1600x900.png) and use it in the Hero section.
missing_requirements.reason: HeroSection references /assets/generated/ca-hero-bg-professional.dim_1600x900.png, but the diff shows no added files, so the required static asset addition is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Claims of changes to multiple other frontend files/sections (App, Navbar, Footer, About/Services/Highlights/Contact sections, ContactForm, index.css palette updates, tailwind config, index.html SEO) that are not evidenced by the diff.
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff only shows modifications to HeroSection.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, and project_state.json. The described changes appear only as statements in frontend-file-summaries.txt without corresponding code diffs for those files.
evidence: file-diff summary: Modified files list only includes HeroSection.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json
